topic.title: login on another machine
topic.body: I have an account already but re-installed zeronet because i couldn't find why my firewall was blocking it. I had to create new account, but I want to use my old one. How can I do that?

1_1ASFMANgCvtRUuZbz3GmxCsvRAJ4iHb6r2.body:
> [kopykate](#comment_33_16w7UuJAHbt8YBa8zxHS7UFk9mq8Q5DpE4): Copy the old folder from your previous computer, put it on a USB stick, then transfer it to the new computer. The easiest and best way to do it, so you can keep all of your sites as well.
> The more complicated way to do it is to copy the Masterseed in Users.json, but even I have had trouble getting it to work .. not worth the effort, haha.

I restored the file from my recycle bin and saved it over the other folder. When I opened zeronet my only log in choice was this acc.. interesting hmm
